title: Marching On
lyrics:
Marching on
In the light of God,
Marching on
I am marching on
Up the path
That the Master trod
Marching, marching on.

CHORUS:
A robe of white,
A crown of gold,
A harp, a home,
A mansion fair
A victorâ€™s palm,
A joy untold,
Are mine when I get there.

Marching on
Thro' the hosts of sin,
Marching on
I am marching on,
Victory mine
While I've Christ within,
Marching, marching on.

Marching on
While the skeptics sneer,
Marching on,
I am marching on,
Perfect love
Casteth out all fear;
Marching, marching on.

Marching on
With the flag unfurled
Marching on,
I am marching on,
Preaching Christ
To the dying world,
Marching, marching on.
